title: ENCHANTRESS -- Mystical Atmospheric Music Vol. I
description: Music pack containing 10 high fidelity Mystical & Atmospheric tracks.
longDescription:
The pack contains ten pieces of music designed mainly for Open World RPGs. They will fit any mysterious atmospheric project from games to trailers or advertising. The tracks were tested in various conditions (Headphones: studio/consumer, Speakers :PC and TV HI-FI /consumer, Studio Monitors) to offer the best possible result.


This is the first volume of the "Mystical Atmospheric Music" series that will develop according to public request. All the tracks are handcrafted using multiple sound layers and harmonies.


Album Trailer on SoundCloud


Album Playlist on YouTube (Made in Unreal Engine)


For any questions or custom work: Alex.M


Eulogy      - 4.03 min

The Pyre      - 4.07 min 

Somniferum - 4.03 min

Soul Syphon   - 5.32 min

Emeralds    - 4.52 min

Lightbringer    - 3.58 min

Apostate    - 4.02 min

Lexicon Ex    - 4.50 min

Protocol:Apha  - 2.33 min

Protocol:Omega - 2.33 min

------------------------------------------------

Enjoy and Thank you for your time!
technicalDetails:
Features:


 High fidelity.

 High Quality Mix and Master.

 Easily combined with other music genres.

 Specially composed for smooth transition to/from other tracks.


Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10


Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16bit (Higher quality can be provided upon request)


Does music loop: No


Minutes of audio provided: 39.15


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: N/A

Important/Additional Notes: N/A
